title: Summary
description: Experienced in front-end, using Javascript and React as main technologies. 1 year and a half of experience mixing personal projects, sporadic jobs and self-taught training. I left my last job unrelated to the sector to finish refining my learning. Currently looking for a position as Junior Developer.

title: Education
description: Almost all of my knowledge about web development and programming has been learned remotely in a self-taught manner. In addition to personal projects, I learn a lot by frequenting the main online platforms for developers and reading official documentation.

items.name: C.F.G.S. administration and finance
items.description: I learned about organization and management of companies, taxes and accounting in general.

items.name: Responsive Web Design Certification
items.description: 300 hours approximately about modern HTML and CSS techniques such as Flexbox, Grid, variables, media queries and also best practices for accessibility.

items.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
items.description: 300 hours approximately about fundamentals of JS including variables, arrays, objects, loops, and functions. Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and Functional Programming (FP).

items.name: Front End Development Libraries
items.description: Improve skills learning most popular front-end libraries: React and Redux. Also learned advanced CSS with SASS/SCSS and Bootstrap.

items.name: Relational Database
items.description: 300 hours approximately about PostgreSQL using real developer tools including VS Code, Git and scripting in Bash.

items.name: Back End Development and APIs
items.description: Learned to code back-end apps with Node and Express managing database with MongoDB, Mongoose and Atlas.

title: Experience
description: My real experience as a developer consists of one year as a self-employed worker and multiple self-taught projects. Currently looking for my first junior position in a company.

items.name: Self-employed Worker
items.description: Web developer using WordPress and HTML/CSS/JS. SEO jobs and hosting management.

title: Currently
description: I am currently developing a web application for a restaurant located in Torremolinos and learning Next.js, a React's framework.
